supporting.text: Not all cancer patients are unable to work; many continue working during treatment or after recovery.

attacks.text: Not all cancer patients are unable to work; many continue working during treatment or after recovery.

supporting.text: Many countries require medical and functional assessments to determine eligibility for disability, which not all cancer patients meet.

attacks.text: Many countries require medical and functional assessments to determine eligibility for disability, which not all cancer patients meet.
